question: Who has been appointed as the new special secretary in Ministry of Ayush?
explanation: The renowned Ayurveda physician ‘Vaidya’ Rajesh Kotecha has been appointed as new special secretary in Ministry of Ayush for three years on a contract basis. Kotecha is the chief consultant of Chakrapani Ayurveda Clinic, Jaipur. The appointment is in line with the Centre\'s efforts to bring in specialists from the private sector in the government.
